ygData.subject: Re: Hand to Hand
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would assume the perceived delay shortens because they dual wield and double attack more as they get higher in level. Even though all this damage is
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 6 Sep 1999, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> Monk punches deffinitly speed up at high levels or they don't start out with
> the same delay. Go watch a 40+ monk tank something the damage they deal is
> amazing.

I would assume the perceived delay shortens because they dual
wield and double attack more as they get higher in level.
Even though all this damage is applied in the same instant,
the animations happen sequentially, and thus the average pause
between animations becomes shorter simply because there are
more double attacks and dual wields. Like I said, I have yet
to see any empirical evidence that their punches do in fact
get faster.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
